segments.text: The principal just announced that Dr . Smith is going to take over as dean of our department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you so calm ? Are you not surprised to hear this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I knew it all along . He was the obvious choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think he can do well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A new broom sweeps clean anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
